mapper.update: UPDATE travelreview SET view = view + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travelreview (title, created_at, mateuse, concepttype, matetype, content, city_id, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, NOW(), #{mateUse}, #{conceptType}, #{mateType}, #{content}, #{cityId}, #{memberId})

mapper.select: SELECT tr.idx, tr.title, tri.saved_name AS thumbnail, tr.view, c.name AS cityName, co.name AS countryName FROM travelreview tr LEFT JOIN travelreview_image tri ON tri.travelreview_idx = tr.idx AND tri.created_at = ( SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM travelreview_image WHERE travelreview_idx = tr.idx ) LEFT JOIN city c ON tr.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN country co ON c.country_id = co.id ORDER BY tr.view DESC LIMIT 3
